title: When is the Coast Guard Cutter Diligence scheduled to return to Wilmingtion? It has been undergoing upgrades & maintenance for some time now.
text:
The cutter is scheduled to return sometime this summer.

Here's a link to an earlier story:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091016/ARTICLES/910169910



Here's a link to the cutter's website, with an update on what the
crew is up to. While the Diligence is in drydock, the crew has been
aboard another cutter, the Venturous:

http://www.uscg.mil/lantarea/cgcDiligence/docs/Shore%20Ties%20Edition%2010-01%20March%202010.pdf
